title: 241: Venting About Our Partners + David Dobrik’s “Apology” + Matt James Back On Instagram + More!
itunes:title: 241: Venting About Our Partners + David Dobrik’s “Apology” + Matt James Back On Instagram + More!
description:
(TW: S*xual Assault discussed during David Dobrik segment - time stamped below)It’s Tuesday and The Broads discuss their weekends and end up diving into certain “habits” their partners have that drive them bonkers. They then discuss the recent updates about David Dobrik and the Vlog Squad (00:40:00).  Later they chat Matt James return to instagram, Bennet’s continued Kelly obsession, Matt’s mom becoming a full blown instagram influencer and more!

*Join The Broads Thursday for a meaningful discussion with Peter Rollins and join The Bros Friday for a “Getting To Know The Bros” episode! 

RESOURCES:National Resources for S*xual Assault Survivors: https://www.rainn.org/national-resources-sexual-assault-survivors-and-their-loved-ones

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FAB FIT FUN: se coupon code CHATTY for $10 off your first box at WWW.FABFITFUN.COM

***ADAM & EVE: Select any one item for 50% off and Adam & Eve will throw in TEN free gifts - go to adamandeve.com and enter code CHATTY and checkout!

***DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILYHARVEST.COM and enter promo code CHATTY to get $25 off your first box!

***MODERN FERTILITY: Modern Fertility is offering our listeners $20 off the test when you go to MODERNFERTILITY.COM/CHATTY

***FIRST LEAF WINE CLUB: Get 6 bottles of wine for $29.95 AND free shipping at TRYFIRSTLEAF.COM/CHATTY

***ARTICLE: Get $50 off your first purchase of $100 or more at ARTICLE.COM/CHATTY

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
